gw.solr.consistency

Class IReconstructor

  • gw.solr.consistency.IReconstructor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class IReconstructor
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    If a solr update message fails a consistency check, then the message must be reconstructed properly from the correct set of beans. This is performed by passing an implementation of this interface to the Solr messaging plugin's ConsistencyTracker instance.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONObject reconstructDocument(org.json.simple.JSONObject docObj, List<KeyableBean> updatedBeans)
      Reconstructs a Solr update message using the updated beans passed in. Typically this is done by finding the root bean for the document graph in the bean list and using the appropriate createDocument() method but for some documents additional computations may be necessary

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • reconstructDocument

        org.json.simple.JSONObject reconstructDocument(org.json.simple.JSONObject docObj,
                                             List<KeyableBean> updatedBeans)
        Reconstructs a Solr update message using the updated beans passed in. Typically this is done by finding the root bean for the document graph in the bean list and using the appropriate createDocument() method but for some documents additional computations may be necessary
        Parameters:
        docObj - a json representation of the document being reconstructed
        updatedBeans - the list of updated entities to be used to compose this Solr document
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the updated document
